misc: Bags Miura irons and is rumoured to sleep with them.
biography: Miso, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is set to make his tenth appearance in the upcoming 2025 tournament. Representing Hirsala Golf, Miso is known for his meticulous approach to the game.

Off the course, Miso is a bit of an enigma. Some say he is overly attached to his Miura irons, quipping that he even sleeps with them. Regardless, Miso's dedication to golf is clear, as evidenced by his past victory at the Hector Trophée. While the coveted Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, his consistent presence in the competition signals his determination.
Fans and fellow competitors alike eagerly anticipate Miso's performance in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. He will undoubtedly bring his characteristic intensity to the greens.
